Open-ended questions are questions that cannot be answered with a simple yes, no, 
or other one-word answer. Such questions typically begin with Why or How. By using 
open-ended questions, a coach creates an opportunity for birth attendants to discuss  
and reflect on their practices rather than simply agreeing (or disagreeing) with the coach.
